description: Numbers n such that n is a product of two different primes and n-2 is prime.
links: Zak Seidov and Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..21728 (First 10000 terms by Zak Seidov)
prog: (PARI) is(n)=isprime(n-2) && bigomega(n)==2 && !issquare(n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 20 2014
